experience: You and Deborah both know Adwait Ullal, Whitney Belker Vauvelle, and 12 others
Independent Software Developer, Consultant, Mentor, Speaker, and Trainer (C#, Angular, TypeScript)
San Francisco Bay Area / Silicon Valley
I provide software consulting services to clients all over the world. I specialize in Web development using Angular and .NET development using C#.I'm available to help you and your development team.

I author Angular, C# and Visual Studio courses such as  "Angular with TypeScript"​, "Angular Front to Back with Web API"​, "Visual Studio 2015 First Look"​, "AngularJS Line of Business Applications"​, "Object-Oriented Programming Fundamentals in C#"​, "Defensive Coding Techniques in C#"​, "Practical LINQ"​, "Mastering Visual Studio 2013"​ and "Visual Studio Data Tools for Developers"
Speaker at professional conferences such as VSLive! and TechEd. Also present at local code camps and user groups.
The College of William & Mary in Virginia
The College of William & Mary in Virginia
summary: I am an independent software developer, consultant, mentor, speaker and trainer. I specialize in designing and developing successful .NET applications using C# and VB.NET and Web applications using technologies such as AngularJS, TypeScript and ASP.NET Web API. I also provide individualized training, code reviews and mentoring services.How can I help you and your team?I have authored several successful Pluralsight courses including: "Angular with TypeScript"​, "Angular Front to Back with Web API"​, "AngularJS: Line of Business Applications"​, "Object-Oriented Programming Fundamentals in C#"​, and "Defensive Coding in C#"​ (http://www.pluralsight.com/author/deborah-kurata)I post regularly to my blog on technology topics. (http://msmvps.com/blogs/deborahk)I have authored several books, including the "Doing Objects"​ series (Addison-Wesley), "Best Kept Secrets in .NET"​ (Apress) and "Doing Web Development: Client-Side Techniques" (Apress).I also speak at user groups and at conferences, such as VSLive and TechEd. For my work in support of software development and software developers, I have been recognized with the Microsoft Most Valuable Professional (MVP) award.Specialties: Angular, TypeScript, .NET Framework, C#, Web development
name: Deborah Kurata
title: GDE | MVP | Independent Software Developer | Consultant | Speaker
